summary.span: 返回系统上当前安装的语音合成（文字到语音）语音的集合。

span.span: Returns the collection of speech synthesis (text-to-speech) voices that are currently installed on the system.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当应用程序调用，该方法会验证，每个语音 （适用于文本到语音转换引擎） 中找到注册表满足某些最低标准。When an application calls , the method verifies that each of the voices (engines for text-to-speech) it finds in the registry meets certain minimum criteria. 未通过验证，任何语音设置其属性设置为`False`。For any voice that fails verification, sets its property to `False`. 应用程序不能选择语音其属性是`False`。An application cannot select a voice whose property is `False`. 通常情况下，应用程序不会设置语音属性。Typically, applications will not set a voice’s property.

MemberSignature.Value: Public Custom Event PhonemeReached As EventHandler(Of PhonemeReachedEventArgs)

summary.span: 当音素达到时引发。

span.span: Raised when a phoneme is reached.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 一个音素是书面语言的基本组件，通常以字母的字母 （或两个字母的组合） 表示一个或多个不同的声音。A phoneme is a basic component of written language, typically a letter of an alphabet (or the combination of two letters) that represents one or more distinct sounds. 例如，字母"c"是听起来像"s"中"cinder"或"catch"中"k"等音素。For example, the letter "c" is a phoneme that may sound like "s" in "cinder", or like "k" in "catch". 文字是音素的集合。A written word is an assemblage of phonemes. 单词中更改一个音素将改变它的拼写。Changing a phoneme in a word will alter its spelling. 一个实例生成的每个部分构成一个音素某个词的事件。A instance generates a event for each portion of a word that constitutes a phoneme. 例如，词"主题"将生成三个事件; 为"th"声音、"e"声音和"m"声音 (me) 的一个。For example, for the word "theme" would generate three events; one for the "th" sound, one for the "e" sound, and one for the "m" sound (me). 有关示例，以及与事件相关联的数据有关的信息，请参阅。For an example and information about data associated with the event, see .

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance void SelectVoice(string name) cil managed

param.name: name
param.span: 要选择该的语音的名称。

span.span: The name of the voice to select.

summary.span: 通过名称选择特定语音。

span.span: Selects a specific voice by name.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用方法和类来获取名称的安装可以选择的文本到语音转换 (TTS) 语音。Use the method and class to obtain the names of installed text-to-speech (TTS) voices that you can select. 若要选择一种声音，请将传递的全部内容属性的参数作为方法。To select a voice, pass the entire contents of the property as the argument for the method. 对象中选择包含的第一个已安装的语音`name`中的语音属性。The object selects the first installed voice that contains `name` in the voice's property. 执行区分大小写，子字符串比较，以确定是否与匹配语音`name`。The performs a case-sensitive, substring comparison to determine if the voice matches the `name`. 当应用程序调用，该方法会验证在注册表中找到的语音的每个满足某些最低标准。When an application calls , the method verifies that each of the voices it finds in the registry meets certain minimum criteria. 未通过验证，任何语音设置其属性设置为`False`。For any voice that fails verification, sets its property to `False`. 应用程序不能选择语音其属性是`False`。An application cannot select a voice whose property is `False`. 通常情况下，应用程序不会设置语音属性。Typically, applications will not set a voice’s property. 若要选择语音的性别、 年龄或区域设置，请使用其中一个方法。To select a voice by gender, age, or locale, use one of the methods.

summary.span: 选择具有特定性格的语音。

span.span: Selects a voice with specific characteristics.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用方法和类来获取名称的安装可以选择的文本到语音转换 (TTS) 语音。Use the method and class to obtain the names of installed text-to-speech (TTS) voices that you can select. 对象将选择第一个匹配指定的特性的已安装的语音。The object selects the first installed voice that matches the specified characteristics. 当应用程序调用，该方法会验证在注册表中找到的语音的每个满足某些最低标准。When an application calls , the method verifies that each of the voices it finds in the registry meets certain minimum criteria. 未通过验证，任何语音设置其属性设置为`False`。For any voice that fails verification, sets its property to `False`. 应用程序不能选择语音其属性是`False`。An application cannot select a voice whose property is `False`. 通常情况下，应用程序不会设置语音属性。Typically, applications will not set a voice’s property. 若要按名称选择语音，使用方法To select a voice by name, use the method

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用方法和类来获取名称的安装可以选择的文本到语音转换 (TTS) 语音。Use the method and class to obtain the names of installed text-to-speech (TTS) voices that you can select. 对象查找安装语音其并属性匹配`gender`和`age`参数。The object finds installed voices whose and properties match the `gender` and `age` parameters. 计数的匹配项，它将找到，并返回所用的声音时计数等于`voiceAlternate`参数。The counts the matches it finds, and returns the voice when the count equals the `voiceAlternate` parameter. 当应用程序调用，该方法会验证在注册表中找到的语音的每个满足某些最低标准。When an application calls , the method verifies that each of the voices it finds in the registry meets certain minimum criteria. 未通过验证，任何语音设置其属性设置为`False`。For any voice that fails verification, sets its property to `False`. 应用程序不能选择语音其属性是`False`。An application cannot select a voice whose property is `False`. 通常情况下，应用程序不会设置语音属性。Typically, applications will not set a voice’s property. 若要选择其他特征的声音，请参阅其他重载。To select a voice based on other characteristics, see the other overloads. 若要按名称选择语音，使用方法。To select a voice by name, use the method.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 对象查找观点发布其， ，和属性匹配`gender`， `age`，和`culture`参数。The object finds voices whose , , and properties match the `gender`, `age`, and `culture` parameters. 计数的匹配项，它将找到，并返回所用的声音时计数等于`voiceAlternate`参数。The counts the matches it finds, and returns the voice when the count equals the `voiceAlternate` parameter. Microsoft Windows 和 System.Speech API 接受所有有效语言-国家/地区代码。Microsoft Windows and the System.Speech API accept all valid language-country codes. 若要执行文本到语音转换使用中指定的语言`culture`参数、 支持语言-国家/地区代码，必须在安装的语音合成引擎。To perform text-to-speech using the language specified in the `culture` parameter, a speech synthesis engine that supports that language-country code must be installed. 随 Microsoft Windows 7 的语音合成引擎使用以下语言-国家/地区代码：The speech synthesis engines that shipped with Microsoft Windows 7 work with the following language-country codes: - EN-US。en-US. 英语 （美国）English (United States) - zh CN。zh-CN. 中文 （中国）Chinese (China) - zh-TW。zh-TW. 中文 （台湾）Chinese (Taiwan) 此外允许使用两个字母的语言代码，例如"en"。Two-letter language codes such as "en" are also permitted. 当应用程序调用，该方法会验证在注册表中找到的语音的每个满足某些最低标准。When an application calls , the method verifies that each of the voices it finds in the registry meets certain minimum criteria. 未通过验证，任何语音设置其属性设置为`False`。For any voice that fails verification, sets its property to `False`. 应用程序不能选择语音其属性是`False`。An application cannot select a voice whose property is `False`. 通常情况下，应用程序不会设置语音属性。Typically, applications will not set a voice’s property. 若要选择其他特征的声音，请参阅其他重载。To select a voice based on other characteristics, see the other overloads. 若要按名称选择语音，使用方法。To select a voice by name, use the method.

summary.span: 从字符串、 对象或 对象同步生成语音输出。

span.span: Generates speech output synchronously from a string, a object, or a object.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法会将同步生成语音。The methods generate speech synchronously. 方法不返回之前的内容实例完全所说。The methods do not return until the content of the instance has been completely spoken. 这是生成语音的最简单方法。This is the simplest way to generate speech. 但是，如果你的应用程序需要时执行任务，例如突出显示文本、 绘制动画、 监视器控件或其他任务，使用方法或方法以异步方式生成语音。However, if your application needs to perform tasks while speaking, for example highlight text, paint animation, monitor controls, or other tasks, use the methods or the method to generate speech asynchronously. 在对此方法的调用期间可以引发以下事件：During a call to this method, the can raise the following events: - 。. 合成器的讲话状态更改时引发。Raised when the speaking state of the synthesizer changes. - 。. 当生成语音合成器开始时引发。Raised when the synthesizer begins generating speech. - 。. 合成器达到以字母或字母构成的一种语言中的语音离散声音组合每次引发。Raised each time the synthesizer reaches a letter or combination of letters that constitute a discreet sound of speech in a language. - 。. 每次引发合成器完成讲一个单词。Raised each time the synthesizer completes speaking a word. - 。. 每次语音的输出要求嘴巴或面部肌肉用于生成语音的位置中进行更改时引发。Raised each time spoken output requires a change in the position of the mouth or the facial muscles used to produce speech. - 。. 合成器遇到一条提示中的书签时引发。Raised when the synthesizer encounters a bookmark in a prompt. - 。. 说话的语音合成器的更改时引发。Raised when the speaking voice for the synthesizer changes. 不会引发事件处理的任何时方法。The does not raise the event while processing any of the methods.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance void Speak(class System.Speech.Synthesis.Prompt prompt) cil managed

span.span: Generates speech output asynchronously from a string, a object, or a object.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法以异步方式生成语音。The methods generate speech asynchronously. 方法立即返回而不等待的内容完成谈到的对象。The methods return immediately without waiting for the content of the object to finish speaking. 使用如果你的应用程序需要时执行的任务，例如突出显示的文本，绘制动画、 监视器控件或其他任务。Use if your application needs to perform tasks while speaking, for example highlight text, paint animation, monitor controls, or other tasks. 在对此方法的调用期间可以引发以下事件：During a call to this method, the can raise the following events: - 。. 合成器的讲话状态更改时引发。Raised when the speaking state of the synthesizer changes. - 。. 当生成语音合成器开始时引发。Raised when the synthesizer begins generating speech. - 。. 合成器达到以字母或字母构成的一种语言中的语音离散声音组合每次引发。Raised each time the synthesizer reaches a letter or combination of letters that constitute a discreet sound of speech in a language. - 。. 每次引发合成器完成讲一个单词。Raised each time the synthesizer completes speaking a word. - 。. 每次语音的输出要求嘴巴或面部肌肉用于生成语音的位置中进行更改时引发。Raised each time spoken output requires a change in the position of the mouth or the facial muscles used to produce speech. - 。. 合成器遇到一条提示中的书签时引发。Raised when the synthesizer encounters a bookmark in a prompt. - 。. 说话的语音合成器的更改时引发。Raised when the speaking voice for the synthesizer changes. - 。. 合成器完成时引发操作。Raised when the synthesizer finishes a operation. 如果你的应用程序不需要时执行任务，则可以使用方法或方法来同步生成语音。If your application does not need to perform tasks while speaking, you can use the methods or the method to generate speech synchronously.

span.span: Cancels the asynchronous synthesis operation for a queued prompt.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此外可以使用此方法取消异步说出以下操作：You can also use this method to cancel an asynchronous speak operation for the following: - 内容指定的方法。The contents of a specified by a method. - 内容指定的方法。The contents of a specified by a method. - 内容包含由指定的 SSML方法。The contents of a containing SSML specified by a method. 当您调用， ，或，创建 System.Speech对象并使用该方法的参数的内容填充它，并返回对象。When you call , , or , System.Speech creates a object and populates it with the contents of the method's parameter, and returns the object. 如果保留一份返回，可以将其传递取消中指定的讲话内容或对象。If you retain a copy of the returned , you can pass it into to cancel speaking content specified in a or a object.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance void SpeakAsyncCancelAll() cil managed

summary.span: 取消所有排队、异步、语音合成操作。

span.span: Cancels all queued, asynchronous, speech synthesis operations.

MemberSignature.Value: Public Custom Event SpeakCompleted As EventHandler(Of SpeakCompletedEventArgs)

summary.span: 当 完成提示的讲话的时候引发。

span.span: Raised when the completes the speaking of a prompt.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 将引发在完成时的任何事件或方法。The raises the event at the completion of any of the or methods. 类不具有任何属性，且不返回数据从事件。The class has no properties, and does not return data from the event. 它用于启用应用程序作者编写事件处理程序事件。It is provided to enable application authors to write event handlers for the event.

MemberSignature.Value: Public Custom Event SpeakProgress As EventHandler(Of SpeakProgressEventArgs)

span.span: Raised after the speaks each individual word of a prompt.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 引发此事件对于它在提示符下使用任一说出每个新单词， ， ，或方法。The raises this event for each new word that it speaks in a prompt using any of the , , , or methods. 有关示例和与事件相关联的数据有关的详细信息，请参阅。For an example and more information about data associated with the event, see .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 引发此事件时将开始处理在提示符下使用任一， ， ，或方法。The raises this event when it begins processing a prompt using any of the , , , or methods. 类不具有任何属性，且不返回数据从事件。The class has no properties, and does not return data from the event. 它用于启用应用程序作者编写事件处理程序事件。It is provided to enable application authors to write event handlers for the event.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 引发该事件时其谈到更改。The raises this event when its speaking changes. 有关示例和与事件相关联的数据有关的详细信息，请参阅。For an example and more information about data associated with the event, see . 若要暂停和恢复语音合成，请使用和方法。To pause and resume speech synthesis, use the and methods.

MemberSignature.Value: Public Custom Event VisemeReached As EventHandler(Of VisemeReachedEventArgs)

summary.span: 当 viseme 达到时引发。

span.span: Raised when a viseme is reached.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 一个 viseme 时读出音素嘴巴和人脸的基本位置。A viseme is the basic position of the mouth and face when pronouncing a phoneme. Visemes 是音素的可视表示形式。Visemes are visual representations of phonemes. System.Speech 支持美国英语，其中每个对应于一个或多个音素 21 visemes。System.Speech supports 21 visemes for US English, each of which corresponds to one or more phonemes. 当新音素达到具有比上一个音素达到不同相应 viseme 时，会引发事件。 events are raised when a new phoneme reached has a different corresponding viseme than the previous phoneme reached. 由于某些 visemes 表示多个音素下一个音素达到对应于同一个 viseme 作为上一个音素时，不会生成事件。Since some visemes represent more than one phoneme, a event is not generated if the next phoneme reached corresponds to the same viseme as the previous phoneme. 例如，对于说出的单词"此区域"中"this"的"s"和"区域"中的"z"引发事件。For example, for the spoken words "this zone", a event is raised for the "s" in "this" and the "z" in "zone". 但是，不会引发事件的"区域"中的"z"因为它对应于"s"中"this"作为同一个 viseme。However, a event is not raised for the "z" in "zone" because it corresponds to the same viseme as the "s" in "this". 下面是 21 SAPI 音素和对应于在美国英语 viseme 的音素组的列表。The following is a list of the 21 SAPI phonemes and phoneme groups that correspond to a viseme in US English. |VisemeViseme|Phoneme(s)Phoneme(s)| |------------|------------------| |00|无声段silence| |11|ae，ax，噢ae, ax, ah| |22|aaaa| |33|aoao| |44|键，是吧，嗯ey, eh, uh| |55|erer| |66|y、 iy、 ih、 ixy, iy, ih, ix| |77|w uww, uw| |88|owow| |99|awaw| |1010|oyoy| |1111|结果ay| |1212|hh| |1313|rr| |1414|ll| |1515|s, zs, z| |1616|sh，ch、 jh、 zhsh, ch, jh, zh| |1717|th dhth, dh| |1818|f、 vf, v| |1919|d、 t、 nd, t, n| |2020|k、 g、 ngk, g, ng| |2121|p、 b、 mp, b, m| 与关联的数据有关的信息`VisemeReached`事件，请参阅。For information about data associated with the `VisemeReached` event, see .
